channel.title: Information
channel.description: I am using PimpScape source, and i was wondering if anyone could give me the code to there custom, or non-man made screen-stats. Screen stats meaning the info at the top screen, in game. Usually says 'Players online:' or 'NAMEscape' or 'Owner:' Anyone have the code? And tell where i put it?

item.title: Information
item.dc:creator: @x_spike_x x spike x
item.description:
@x_spike_x wrote:

hmm. ill just seach, may have to add an public int.

Read full topic

item.title: Information
item.dc:creator: @KillerbeeWon KillerbeeWon
item.description:
@KillerbeeWon wrote:

This is what i have…

public static boolean LoggingClicks = false; public int JunaTele = -1; public void println_debug(String str) { System.out.println("[client-"+playerId+"-"+playerName+"]: "+str); } //Playercount and server name at top of screen public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126("@whi@~BeeScape~@whi@~", 6570); sendFrame126("@whi@Pkpoints: " +pkpoints+ ".", 6572); sendFrame126(" @red@players online: " + players, 6664); setInt } public void println(String str) { System.out.println("[client-"+playerId+"-"+playerName+"]: "+str);

And it still doesnt work. I have phonescape by the way, just another pimpscape! :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: Information
item.dc:creator: @x_spike_x x spike x
item.description:
@x_spike_x wrote:

Just open client.java
search for:

public void

Then after the last }
Add:

//Playercount and server name at top of screen public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126(" @whi@~[SERVER NAME]~@whi@~", 6570); sendFrame126("@whi@Pkpoints: " +pkpoints+ ".", 6572); sendFrame126(" @red@players online: " + players, 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673);//6673 }

And change [SERVER NAME] to the name of your server.

Read full topic

item.title: Information
item.dc:creator: @x_spike_x x spike x
item.description:
@x_spike_x wrote:

Add this void:

//Playercount and server name at top of screen public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126(" @whi@~[SERVER NAME]~@whi@~", 6570); sendFrame126("@whi@Pkpoints: " +pkpoints+ ".", 6572); sendFrame126(" @red@players online: " + players, 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673);//6673 }

Change the [SERVER NAME] to well obviously, your servers name this is the one for pimpscape so it also includes pk points at the top and players online.

If you want to change the colour change the @whi or @@red to the colour you want;

@cya
@yel
@gre
@red
@blu
@dbl
@dre
@bla

=================================
Hope this helps, if not, feel free to pm me.

P.S. could sum1 tell me if there is already a tut for something like this, if not i will create one, thanks.

Read full topic
